channel.title: Lagg server
channel.description: when on my server over 10 people is online.. the server will lagg, now they are 32 people online, and still lagging how do i make my server non-lagg?

item.title: Lagg server
item.dc:creator: @I_kolo_I I kolo I
item.description:
@I_kolo_I wrote:

i did told you …

the lagg isnt only at my computer!

everybody who plays my server got lagg.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 04, 2008, 04:06:30 pm[/size][hr]omfg…

Read full topic

item.title: Lagg server
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

try cleaning it out, or getting rid of unnecessary files. Such as the more info folder. Clean out chars etc but its most likely your computer.

Read full topic

item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

Noob.Coder:

theres no such thing as 95/100 mbps theres no set mbps as max… 54.0 is like EXTREMEMLY HIGH! Most people have like 30.0 mbps.

hahaha? he just proved u wrong lol,

item.title: Lagg server
item.dc:creator: @I_kolo_I I kolo I
item.description:
@I_kolo_I wrote:

i got 95/100bmps internet but, i use allstar source V2 much ppl said it is most laggy source ever… but if i transform to another source i need to do all that work again… adding shop… ading places… adding npc’s… etc.

item.title: Lagg server
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

Well, I don’t know any sources that make lag or not because my computer is an amazing computer and I have 54.0 Mbps internet connection. My server has no lag on it at all.

Read full topic

item.title: Lagg server
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

A client has nothing to do with lags. All it does is connect to your server, try deleting unnecessary files, or getting a better internet connection. More stable sources also help too since your probably using something made from czar.

Read full topic

item.title: Lagg server
item.dc:creator: @I_kolo_I I kolo I
item.description:

i deleted anitlag.java,

i got a question:

does making a server client… give less laggs??

Read full topic

item.title: Lagg server
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

Allstarscape v2 is one of the laggiest sources ever made.

Try something atleast like deltascape or if you fell up to the challenge try rs2dv.

Read full topic

item.title: Lagg server
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

Use AllstarScape V2 and see if it reduces the lag.

Read full topic

item.title: Lagg server
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“kihomura, post:7, topic:240709”][quote author=legend-scape link=topic=317035.msg2516336#msg2516336 date=1225633285]

when on my server over 10 people is online… the server will lagg, now they are 32 people online, and still lagging how do i make my server non-lagg?

rofl? no it doesent, it stops a lil bit of lagg ive tried it loool

try adding ur ANTILAG.java to ur char’s file and open your char’s files and the antilag wen u put the server on + get a restarter
[/quote]

Antilag.java’s do nothing but lag your server even more.

On topic - Your computer most likely can’t handle it or you have a bad internet connection.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Lagg server
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

Use a more stable source, since as kiho said, your computer can’t handle it.

Read full topic

item.title: Lagg server

item.description:

when on my server over 10 people is online… the server will lagg, now they are 32 people online, and still lagging how do i make my server non-lagg?
[/quote]

try adding ur ANTILAG.java to ur char’s file and open your char’s files and the antilag wen u put the server on + get a restarter[/quote]

Antilag.java’s do nothing but lag your server even more.

On topic - Your computer most likely can’t handle it or you have a bad internet connection.
